title: Digenis Lakkoma F.C.
text:
Digenis Lakkoma F.C. is a <a href="Greece">Greek</a> <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club, based in <a href="Kallikrateia">Lakkoma</a>, <a href="Chalkidiki">Chalkidiki</a>.
The club was founded in 1957. They will play in <a href="Football%20League%202%20%28Greece%29">Football League 2</a> for the season 2013-14
